ValidationRule.description: A PIN Number can't have 4 Numbers Ascending. Ex: 1234
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNUMBER(PIN__c), VALUE(MID(PIN__c, 1,1)) +1 = VALUE(MID(PIN__c, 2,1)), VALUE(MID(PIN__c, 2,1)) +1 = VALUE(MID(PIN__c, 3,1)), VALUE(MID(PIN__c, 3,1)) +1 = VALUE(MID(PIN__c, 4,1)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PIN Can NOT be 4 numbers in Ascending order (Ex: 1234)
